unit.textstats: Troop Type: Ca Movement: 5 Weapon Skill: 7 Balistic Skill: 7 Strength: 4/7 Toughness: 3 Wounds: 3 Initiative: 8 Attack: 4 Leadership: 10 Armour Save: 1+ Ward Save: (2+), 6+ Magic: ItemPts: 100
unit.name: Prince

item.name: Dawnstone
item.summary: Bearer can re-roll failed armour saves.
item.description: Bearer can re-roll failed armour saves.

link.name: Always Strikes First (Rider only)
link.description: Always Strikes First regardless of Initiative. If Initiative is equal to or higher than enemy's, re-roll To Hit misses in Close Combat. If Always Strikes Last is also present this ability is nullified.

unit.textstats: Troop Type: - Movement: 9 Weapon Skill: 3 Balistic Skill: - Strength: 3 Toughness: 3 Wounds: 1 Initiative: 4 Attack: 1 Leadership: 5 Armour Save: Ward Save: Magic: ItemPts: -
unit.name: Elven Steed

link.name: Swiftstride
link.description: When charging / fleeing / pursuing, units made entirely of models with Swiftstride roll 3D6 and discard the lowest instead of 2D6 for distance.

unit.info: Swiftstride

link.name: Ithilmar Barding
link.description: +1 armour save bonus, no penalty to Movement.

link.name: Martial Prowess
link.description: Can make supporting attacks with one extra rank (cumulative with any other special rules). Can shoot with one more rank than normal (cumulative with any other special rules).

link.name: Valour of Ages
link.description: When fighting an army that contains Dark Elves, may re-roll all failed Panic, Fear and Terror tests.

link.name: Fireborn
link.description: 2+ ward save against Wounds caused by Flaming Attacks.

link.name: General
link.description: Inspiring Presence: If not fleeing, friendly units within 12" may use this model's Leadership.

link.name: Hand Weapon
link.description: 6+ Parry Save in Close Combat if footed while fighting with a shield vs. models to the front.

link.name: Dragon Armour
link.description: Heavy armour; 6+ ward save. Gives Fireborn to the wearer.

unit.info: Composition: Lord General; Hand Weapon; Dragon Armour; Always Strikes First (Rider only); Ithilmar Barding; Martial Prowess; Valour of Ages; Fireborn

unit.textstats: Troop Type: In Movement: 5 Weapon Skill: 6 Balistic Skill: 4 Strength: 4/6 Toughness: 3 Wounds: 3 Initiative: 7 Attack: 3 Leadership: 9 Armour Save: 4+ Ward Save: (2+) Magic: 2 ItemPts: 100
unit.name: Loremaster of Hoeth

link.name: Always Strikes First
link.description: Always Strikes First regardless of Initiative. If Initiative is equal to or higher than enemy's, re-roll To Hit misses in Close Combat. If Always Strikes Last is also present this ability is nullified.

link.name: Deflect Shots
link.description: 6+ ward save against non-magical shooting attacks that do not use templates.

link.name: Martial Prowess
link.description: Can make supporting attacks with one extra rank (cumulative with any other special rules). Can shoot with one more rank than normal (cumulative with any other special rules).

link.name: Valour of Ages
link.description: When fighting an army that contains Dark Elves, may re-roll all failed Panic, Fear and Terror tests.

link.name: Always Strikes Last
link.description: Always Strikes Last in Close Combat, regardless of initiative. If Always Strikes First is also present this ability is nullified.

link.name: Miscast Table
link.description: Includes both miscast tables.

link.name: Level 2 Wizard
link.description: Can channel Power and Dispel dice. Adds +2 to all attempts to cast and dispel. Knows 2 spells.

link.name: Great Weapon
link.description: +2 Strength, Always Strikes Last, Requires Two Hands.

link.name: Heavy Armour
link.description: 5+ armour save.

item.name: Dragonhelm
item.summary: +1 armour save bonus. 2+ ward save against Flaming Attacks.
item.description: +1 armour save bonus. 2+ ward save against Flaming Attacks.

item.name: Book of Hoeth
item.summary: Re-roll single dice from each casting or dispel attempts. 6s cannot be re-rolled.
item.description: Re-roll single dice from each casting or dispel attempts. 6s cannot be re-rolled.

item.name: Golden Crown of Atrazar
item.summary: One use only. 2+ ward save against first wound suffered.
item.description: One use only. 2+ ward save against first wound suffered.

unit.description: Magic: A Loremaster of Hoeth is a Level 2 Wizard who does not generate spells as normal, but instead always knows the eight signature spells from the Lores of Battle Magic.
unit.info: Composition: Lord Level 2 Wizard; Great Weapon; Heavy Armour; Always Strikes First; Deflect Shots; Martial Prowess; Valour of Ages; Always Strikes Last

unit.textstats: Troop Type: In/Mo Movement: 5 Weapon Skill: 4 Balistic Skill: 4 Strength: 3 Toughness: 3 Wounds: 2 Initiative: 6 Attack: 2 Leadership: 8 Armour Save: 3+ Ward Save: (2+), 6+ Magic: 2 ItemPts: 50
unit.name: Dragon Mage

unit.textstats: Troop Type: Mo Movement: 6 Weapon Skill: 5 Balistic Skill: - Strength: 5 Toughness: 5 Wounds: 5 Initiative: 4 Attack: 4 Leadership: 7 Armour Save: 3+ Ward Save: Magic: ItemPts: -
unit.name: Sun Dragon

link.name: Dragon Fire
link.description: Breath Weapon, Strength 4, Flaming Attacks.

link.name: Fly
link.description: Model can make a flying movement of 10" and a march flying movement of 20".

link.name: Large Target
link.description: Cannot claim cover modifiers for obstacles. Also, this model's Inspiring Presence or Hold your Ground! ability range is increased to 18".

link.name: Scaly Skin (3+)
link.description: Improves this model's Armour Save.

link.name: Swiftstride
link.description: When charging / fleeing / pursuing, units made entirely of models with Swiftstride roll 3D6 and discard the lowest instead of 2D6 for distance. Moreover, flyers can make a flying charge instead of a normal one, adding 10 instead of the Movement value to the roll.

link.name: Terror
link.description:
Enemy units in base contact must take a Leadership test before blows are struck in Close Combat. If failed, their Weapon Skill is reduced to 1 for that round of Combat.
Units charged by this model must immediately take a Leadership test. If failed, the unit must make a Flee! charge reaction.

link.name: Thunderstomp
link.description: Deals D6 automatic hit at creature's Strength with the Always Strikes Last special rule. Applies only against Infantry, War Beasts or Swarms in base contact.

link.name: Flaming Attacks
link.description: Causes Fear in War Beasts, Chariots and Cavalry. Re-roll failed wounds when shooting at or assaulting a building.

unit.info: Dragon Fire; Fly; Large Target; Scaly Skin (3+); Swiftstride; Terror; Thunderstomp; Flaming Attacks

link.name: Valour of Ages
link.description: When fighting an army that contains Dark Elves, may re-roll all failed Panic, Fear and Terror tests.

link.name: Warrior Mage
link.description: First spell generated is always Flaming Sword of Rhuin.

link.name: Fireborn
link.description: 2+ ward save against Wounds caused by Flaming Attacks.

link.name: Miscast Table
link.description: Includes both miscast tables.

link.name: Level 2 Wizard
link.description: Can channel Power and Dispel dice. Adds +2 to all attempts to cast and dispel. Knows 2 spells.

link.name: Hand Weapon
link.description: 6+ Parry Save in Close Combat if footed while fighting with a shield vs. models to the front.

link.name: Dragon Armour
link.description: Heavy armour; 6+ ward save. Gives Fireborn to the wearer.

item.name: Charmed Shield
item.summary: Shield; First hit suffered is discounted on 2+.
item.description: Shield; First hit suffered is discounted on 2+.

link.name: Always Strikes First (Rider only)
link.description: Always Strikes First regardless of Initiative. If Initiative is equal to or higher than enemy's, re-roll To Hit misses in Close Combat. If Always Strikes Last is also present this ability is nullified.

link.name: Martial Prowess
link.description: Can make supporting attacks with one extra rank (cumulative with any other special rules). Can shoot with one more rank than normal (cumulative with any other special rules).

link.name: Reckless
link.description: +2 to cast spells from Lore of Fire (cumulative with other bonuses), but never receives bonuses to dispel attempts.

unit.info: Composition: Hero Level 2 Wizard; Hand Weapon; Dragon Armour; Always Strikes First (Rider only); Martial Prowess; Reckless; Sun Dragon; Valour of Ages; Warrior Mage; Fireborn

link.name: Always Strikes First
link.description: Always Strikes First regardless of Initiative. If Initiative is equal to or higher than enemy's, re-roll To Hit misses in Close Combat. If Always Strikes Last is also present this ability is nullified.

link.name: Martial Prowess
link.description: Can make supporting attacks with one extra rank (cumulative with any other special rules). Can shoot with one more rank than normal (cumulative with any other special rules).

link.name: Valour of Ages
link.description: When fighting an army that contains Dark Elves, may re-roll all failed Panic, Fear and Terror tests.

link.name: Volley Fire
link.description: Half the models in third and subsequent ranks (rounding up) may shoot. A unit cannot Volley Fire if it moved this turn or as a Stand & Shoot reaction.

link.name: Musician Mus
link.description: +1 to combat resolution in a tie. +1 Leadership when attempting to Rally (may not exceed 10). Allows Swift Reform.

link.description: +1 to Combat Resolution, Standard can be captured if unit Flees.

link.name: Hand Weapon
link.description: 6+ Parry Save in Close Combat if footed while fighting with a shield vs. models to the front.

link.name: Attuned to Magic
link.description: 5+ ward save and Close Combat attacks are magical. Generates additional effects during the player's magic phase.

link.name: Blizzard Aura
link.description: Enemy unit in base contact has Always Strikes Last and suffers -1 to Strength (to a minimum of 1).

link.name: Fly
link.description: Model can make a flying movement of 10" and a march flying movement of 20".

link.name: Large Target
link.description: Cannot claim cover modifiers for obstacles. Also, this model's Inspiring Presence or Hold your Ground! ability range is increased to 18".

link.name: Natural Armour (5+)
link.description: Improves armour save.

link.name: Swiftstride
link.description: When charging / fleeing / pursuing, units made entirely of models with Swiftstride roll 3D6 and discard the lowest instead of 2D6 for distance. Moreover, flyers can make a flying charge instead of a normal one, adding 10 instead of the Movement value to the roll.

link.name: Terror
link.description:
Enemy units in base contact must take a Leadership test before blows are struck in Close Combat. If failed, their Weapon Skill is reduced to 1 for that round of Combat.
Units charged by this model must immediately take a Leadership test. If failed, the unit must make a Flee! charge reaction.

link.name: Thunderstomp
link.description: Deals D6 automatic hit at creature's Strength with the Always Strikes Last special rule. Applies only against Infantry, War Beasts or Swarms in base contact.

unit.info: Composition: Rare Attuned to Magic; Blizzard Aura; Fly; Large Target; Natural Armour (5+); Swiftstride; Terror; Thunderstomp

link.name: Bolt Thrower
link.description: 48" Range, Strength 6, Multiple Wounds (D3), Ignores armour saves. Penetrates ranks at -1 Strength for each model slain.

link.name: Repeater Bolt Thrower
link.description: Can fire either as an ordinary bolt thrower or fire six Range 48", Strength 4, Armour Piercing bolts.

link.name: Armour Piercing
link.description: Wounds caused inflict a further -1 armour save modifier.

link.name: Multiple Wounds (D3)
link.description: Each unsaved Wound inflicted is multiplied by the number indicated.

category.name: Equipment Special Rules
category.footnote: Always Strikes Last in Close Combat, regardless of initiative. If Always Strikes First is also present this ability is nullified.
Wounds caused inflict a further -1 armour save modifier.
2+ ward save against Wounds caused by Flaming Attacks.
Causes Fear in War Beasts, Chariots and Cavalry. Re-roll failed wounds when shooting at or assaulting a building.
Each unsaved Wound inflicted is multiplied by the number indicated.
Half the models in third and subsequent ranks (rounding up) may shoot. A unit cannot Volley Fire if it moved this turn or as a Stand & Shoot reaction.

category.name: Options
category.footnote: Hold your Ground!: If not fleeing, friendly models within 12" may re-roll failed Leadership tests.
24" Range, Strength 3, Volley Fire.
Heavy armour; 6+ ward save. Gives Fireborn to the wearer.
Inspiring Presence: If not fleeing, friendly units within 12" may use this model's Leadership.
+2 Strength, Always Strikes Last, Requires Two Hands.
6+ Parry Save in Close Combat if footed while fighting with a shield vs. models to the front.
5+ armour save.
+2 Strength on the charge.
Can channel Power and Dispel dice. Adds +2 to all attempts to cast and dispel. Knows 2 spells.
6+ armour save.
30" Range, Strength 3, Volley Fire.
+1 to combat resolution in a tie. +1 Leadership when attempting to Rally (may not exceed 10). Allows Swift Reform.
+1 armour save bonus.
(Foot) Fight in Extra Ranks. (Mounted) +1 Strength on the charge.
+1 to Combat Resolution, Standard can be captured if unit Flees.

category.name: Mount
category.footnote: +1 armour save bonus, no penalty to Movement.

category.name: Special Rules
category.footnote: Always Strikes First regardless of Initiative. If Initiative is equal to or higher than enemy's, re-roll To Hit misses in Close Combat. If Always Strikes Last is also present this ability is nullified.

Always Strikes First regardless of Initiative. If Initiative is equal to or higher than enemy's, re-roll To Hit misses in Close Combat. If Always Strikes Last is also present this ability is nullified.

Always Strikes First regardless of Initiative. If Initiative is equal to or higher than enemy's, re-roll To Hit misses in Close Combat. If Always Strikes Last is also present this ability is nullified.
5+ ward save and Close Combat attacks are magical. Generates additional effects during the player's magic phase.
Enemy unit in base contact has Always Strikes Last and suffers -1 to Strength (to a minimum of 1).
6+ ward save against non-magical shooting attacks that do not use templates.
Breath Weapon, Strength 4, Flaming Attacks.
Models with this rule may free reform, feign flights and shoot after having marched.
Model can make a flying movement of 10" and a march flying movement of 20".
Cannot claim cover modifiers for obstacles. Also, this model's Inspiring Presence or Hold your Ground! ability range is increased to 18".
Can make supporting attacks with one extra rank (cumulative with any other special rules). Can shoot with one more rank than normal (cumulative with any other special rules).
Improves armour save.
+2 to cast spells from Lore of Fire (cumulative with other bonuses), but never receives bonuses to dispel attempts.
Can fire either as an ordinary bolt thrower or fire six Range 48", Strength 4, Armour Piercing bolts.
Improves this model's Armour Save.
When charging / fleeing / pursuing, units made entirely of models with Swiftstride roll 3D6 and discard the lowest instead of 2D6 for distance.

Enemy units in base contact must take a Leadership test before blows are struck in Close Combat. If failed, their Weapon Skill is reduced to 1 for that round of Combat.
Units charged by this model must immediately take a Leadership test. If failed, the unit must make a Flee! charge reaction.
Deals D6 automatic hit at creature's Strength with the Always Strikes Last special rule. Applies only against Infantry, War Beasts or Swarms in base contact.
When fighting an army that contains Dark Elves, may re-roll all failed Panic, Fear and Terror tests.
After deployment, this unit can make a free movement of 12".
First spell generated is always Flaming Sword of Rhuin.

category.name: Troop Type
category.footnote: 48" Range, Strength 6, Multiple Wounds (D3), Ignores armour saves. Penetrates ranks at -1 Strength for each model slain.

context.name: Edition
context.ruleset: Enables the 8th edition of the Warhammer rules, published July 2010.

context.name: Game Type
context.ruleset: Normal game of Warhammer Fantasy Battles. Includes The End Times expansion rules as per Warhammer Rulebook Official Update Version 1.9.

context.name: Special Rules
context.ruleset: If checked, Chaos Dwarf Units in Standard Warriors of Chaos Armies are not allowed in the roster.
If checked, Regiments of Renown are not allowed in the roster.
